name: Vishnupriyan J
college: Hindustan Institute Of Technology and Science

education.school: Hindustan Institute Of Technology and Science
education.field_of_study: Information Technology with specialization in Cybersecurity

projects.name: Library Management System
projects.description: Developed a library management tool for my school library using the Python programming language. Students can view available books, borrow and return books, and check their due clearance status. Created a dedicated MySQL database to store and retrieve students data. Timestamps of students book transactions are recorded and stored in the database.

projects.name: Text, File Encryption and Decryption
projects.description: Developed a text and file encryption/decryption website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Users can utilize Rot13, AES, DES, Caesar cipher, TripleDES, and rail fence cipher to encrypt or decrypt text. Users also have the option to upload a text file for encryption and receive the corresponding encrypted file.

projects.name: Live Enumeration Open Source Tool
projects.description: Developed a Linux-based tool for automating pentesting, encompassing tasks such as recon, sensitive data exposure, and vulnerability identification. Users receive notifications via the Discord application when the framework detects valuable information. This tool offers an option to store the results in MySQL database. All data is stored as text with timestamps in their respective folders.

projects.name: API Hacking Tool
projects.description: Developed a Python-based API hacking tool to assess the security posture of website APIs. Designed and implemented modular components for authentication, injection, enumeration, and fuzzing. Conducted thorough testing and debugging to ensure the reliability and effectiveness of the tool.

projects.name: Mini projects
projects.description: Stock market web scraping, Movie ticket alert Bot, ERP Attendance Automator

experiences.description: Completed the Network Security Associate from Fortinet. Completed the Evolution of Cybersecurity from Fortinet. Developed a keylogger using the Python programming language.

Research paper based on Artificial Intelligence in zero-trust learning and deep learning in Healthcare. Suggested the importance of zero-trust learning and deep learning in healthcare security, emphasizing its significance in enhancing security measures.
